item.title: Jason add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jason add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jason add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jason add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jason add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Read, read, read. Read everything -- trash, classics, good and bad, and see how they do it. Just like a carpenter who works as an apprentice and studies the master. Read! You'll absorb it. Then write. If it's good, you'll find out. If it's not, throw it out of the window." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Jason add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Never be afraid to raise your voice for honesty and truth and compassion against injustice and lying and greed. If people all over the world...would do this, it would change the earth." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Jason add a quote by Steven Erikson
item.description: "The lesson of history is that no one learns." -- Steven Erikson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Steven Erikson
item.description: "The future can ever promise but one thing and one thing only: surprises." -- Steven Erikson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Steven Erikson
item.description: "One day, perhaps, you will see for yourself that regrets are as nothing. The value lies in how they are answered." -- Steven Erikson

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jason add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain
